name: Been and Zungis have Lunch.
description:
A game starring a simpleton Been and his pal, Zungis.

You solve puzzles and such to reach your goal, making some lunch.

This is my first game I upload, so please give me some constructive feed back on this game, I would like to improve as a developer. (I would also prefer it if your criticism is more than just "GAME SUCKS" or "GAY")
